titles.title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain customs entries of nuclear fuel assemblies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/30/1998--Introduced. Provides for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain customs entries as if, at the time such entries were made, a specified note to the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States regarding nuclear fuel assemblies was in effect.
